metadata.Title: CVE-2022-26981 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description:
Liblouis through 3.21.0 has a buffer overflow in compilePassOpcode incompileTranslationTable.c (called, indirectly, by tools/lou_checktable.c).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-26981` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
liblouis-data - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
liblouis14 - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
python-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
python3-louis - 3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: liblouis package in esm-infra/bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.5.0-1ubuntu0.4').
